message: Let's be fair. I get 90% and you get 10%.  What do you say?

Since money loses 10% value for you each round, this is actually a fair offer. Your $400000 now is worth more than getting $900000 several rounds later. Let's make a deal and both walk away with good value.
I think we both can do better than this. I'm willing to offer you 40% of the pot, as long as you accept now and don't make us go through more rounds. This is a fair offer given the inflation penalty
